replies.body:
The issue is that the assassins don’t have to hit their kits to instant kill you. When zeds gank process is 
1. Roam bot
2. Shadow > ult on adc
3. Miss q and auto hit spin
4. Auto > ignite 
5. Collect 300-400 gold
That’s the problem. Note his combo happens in under 1 second. 

There’s no evading it unless you are the god of flash

Also warding won’t help. He’ll do it under turret.

"do u want to see x buffs?"

sure, as long as it isnt more damage on their first auto attack, but something that actually has counterplay
I would be good if they killed the passive or ward spotting. its pretty dumb.

To be honest I would rather have buffs to the assassins themselves than Duskblade. At least that way, they would have to rely on their own kits, and their skillshots, rather than abusing an item.

Not to mention, many of those champions could have potential alternative builds that are held back due to their assassin builds nerfs (because of Duskblade).
